::: {.callout-note}
## Key Conventions
- **Data manipulation:** Base R + `data.table` (not tidyverse)
- **Version control:** Git + GitHub for everything
- **Meetings:** Thursdays 9:30am, agendas via GitHub Discussions
- **HPC:** Run production work on Longleaf
:::
